title: NewsBreak: Stocks Tumble as German PMI Falls to 7-Year Low
text:
NewsBreak: Stocks Tumble as German PMI Falls to 7-Year Low

Economic Indicators 51 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 09:51)

© Reuters. Investing.com -- European stock markets turned lower Monday as another round of disappointingly weak readings from regional business surveys showed there’s still no sign of a turnaround in the economy. Germany’s fell to 41.4 from 43.5 last month, its lowest since 2012. Analysts had expected it to turn up to 44.0. The fell to 49.1, also the first time in seven years it’s been below 50. France’s fell to 50.3 from 51.1, while the composite index fell to 51.3 from 52.9.

is due at 4 AM ET (0800 GMT)

-0.7% vs -0.2% before the news

-1.1%, -0.7%

-0.57% vs -0.53% beforehand

NewsBreak: Stocks Tumble as German PMI Falls to 7-Year Low
